ValidationRule.description: Unless Type = Rebid/Extension do not allow Award Date to be after Contract Start Date. Only apply when either the Award Date or Start Date is changed to avoid unrelated operations erroring.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( !$Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c, NOT(ISNEW()), OR( /* Only apply the rule when either Award Date or Start Date is changed */ ISCHANGED(CloseDate), ISCHANGED(Contract_Start_Date__c) ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Rebid")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Extension")), CloseDate > Contract_Start_Date__c
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity Award date must be before Contract Start Date
